item.title: 优步和 Lyft 如何利用漏洞拒付纽约市司机数百万美元工资
item.description:
了解热门共享单车服务如何将工人锁定在应用程序之外，以规避城市最低工资法。【原文：

An inside look at how popular ride-share services locked workers out of their apps to game a city minimum wage law. 

】

item.title: 制片人杰森-布卢姆称好莱坞罢工 "造成了巨大损失
item.description: 恐怖电影制片人杰森-布卢姆（Jason Blum）说，去年好莱坞编剧和演员的双双罢工对电影业 "造成了很大的损害"。【原文：Horror film producer Jason Blum said the twin strikes by Hollywood writers and actors last year “did a lot of damage” to the business.】

item.title: CD&R接近以150亿欧元收购赛诺菲消费者健康部门
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，Clayton Dubilier & Rice 公司正接近达成以约 150 亿欧元（164 亿美元）收购赛诺菲消费保健部门的交易，这可能是今年欧洲最大的交易之一。【原文：Clayton Dubilier & Rice is nearing a deal to acquire Sanofi’s consumer health unit for about €15 billion ($16.4 billion), in what could be one of the largest European transactions this year, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 惠誉表示，米尔顿保险损失可能达到 500 亿美元
item.description: 根据惠誉评级公司的一份报告，飓风米尔顿预计将造成 300 亿至 500 亿美元的保险损失，成为自 2022 年伊恩飓风以来保险业损失最大的一场风暴。【原文：Hurricane Milton is expected to result in insured losses ranging from $30 billion to $50 billion, making it the costliest storm for the industry since Ian in 2022, according to a report by Fitch Ratings.】

item.title: DeepMind 首席执行官称诺贝尔奖是人工智能的 "分水岭
item.description:
诺贝尔奖委员会将化学和物理学奖授予人工智能研究人员。【原文：

The Nobel Committee awarded prizes in chemistry and physics to artificial intelligence researchers. 

】

item.title: 飞机零部件制造商凯旋集团探讨潜在出售事宜
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，Triumph 集团公司正在探索包括出售公司在内的各种选择，这将是涉及航空航天和国防制造商的一系列交易中的最新一笔。【原文：Triumph Group Inc. is exploring options including a sale of the company, in what would be the latest in a string of deals involving aerospace and defense manufacturers, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: OnlyFans 称 2016 年以来向内容创作者支付了 200 亿美元
item.description: 性工作者使用的视频流媒体服务公司 OnlyFans Ltd 自 2016 年成立以来，已向 400 多万内容创作者支付了 200 亿美元。【原文：OnlyFans Ltd, the video streaming service used by sex workers, has paid $20 billion to its more than 4 million content creators since its founding in 2016.】

item.title: 康卡斯特首席执行官罗伯茨发现剪线的光明面
item.description: 康卡斯特公司（Comcast Corp.首席执行官布莱恩-罗伯茨（Brian Roberts）表示，该公司已做好准备应对有线电视用户更多的剪线行为，并将从提供宽带订阅和 NBA 在线比赛中获益。【原文：Comcast Corp. Chief Executive Officer Brian Roberts said his company is prepared for more cord-cutting by cable customers, and will benefit from offering broadband subscriptions and NBA games online.】

item.title: Stripe 称稳定币重启后已在 70 多个国家进行支付
item.description: Stripe 公司表示，在允许使用其平台的商家再次接受加密货币支付后的头 24 小时内，已有来自 70 多个国家的个人使用稳定币进行在线交易。【原文：Stripe Inc. said individuals from more than 70 countries have used stablecoins for online transactions during the first 24 hours after allowing merchants using its platform to accept crypto payments again.】

item.title: 墨西哥 Femsa 将物流业务转让给卡车公司 Traxion
item.description: 墨西哥大型企业 Fomento Economico Mexicano 已同意以 40 亿比索（约合 2.05 亿美元）的价格将物流业务出售给墨西哥卡车运输公司 Grupo Traxion，该企业集团将继续削减其核心零售和装瓶业务以外的资产。【原文：Mexican behemoth Fomento Economico Mexicano has agreed to sell logistics operations to Mexican trucking firm Grupo Traxion for 4 billion pesos ($205 million) as the conglomerate continues to shed assets outside its core retail and bottling operations.】

item.title: 俄罗斯扣押飞机事件后飞机债务销售反弹
item.description: 在俄罗斯入侵乌克兰之后几乎关闭的飞机债券市场又出现了生机勃勃的迹象，这一发展使得投资公司购买飞机变得更加容易。【原文：A market for aircraft bonds that all but shut down after Russia’s invasion of Ukraine is showing signs of life again, a development that makes it easier for investment firms to buy planes.】

item.title: Netflix 已订购约翰-穆莱尼的新现场综艺脱口秀节目
item.description: Netflix 公司已经订购了喜剧演员约翰-穆兰尼（John Mulaney）的现场综艺脱口秀节目，这是该流媒体巨头在过去十年中一直苦恼的节目类型的新变化。【原文：Netflix Inc. has ordered a live variety talk show from comedian John Mulaney, a new spin at a genre that has bedeviled the streaming giant over the last decade.】

item.title: 法国计划出售 3,000 亿欧元债券为预算融资
item.description: 在经历了数月的政治动荡之后，法国宣布计划明年出售 3,000 亿欧元（3,280 亿美元）的政府债券，为预算提供资金。【原文：France has announced plans to sell €300 billion ($328 billion) in government bonds next year to finance its budget, following months of political turmoil.】

item.title: 银行财报将为股市提供经济健康状况的关键信息
item.description: 随着美联储开始回调利率，以及不确定性继续给经济蒙上阴影，华尔街准备一窥美国最大银行的前景。【原文：Wall Street is poised for a glimpse into the outlook for the biggest US banks as the Federal Reserve starts dialing back interest rates and uncertainty continues to shadow the economy.】

item.title: 法国为解决 "巨额 "债务而打击企业和富人
item.description: 法国政府公布了下一年度的预算案，旨在以 606 亿欧元（约合 662 亿美元）的资金补救岌岌可危的公共财政，并重建投资者的信心，尽管它面临着被充满敌意的议会驱逐的风险。【原文：The French government unveiled a budget for next year that aims to deliver a €60.6 billion ($66.2 billion) remedy for its creaking public finances and rebuild investor confidence even as it risks eviction by a hostile parliament.】

item.title: 波音公司若被裁成垃圾股，将成为美国有史以来最大的 "堕落天使
item.description: 如果被降为垃圾级，波音公司将成为有史以来被取消投资级评级的最大美国企业借款人，这将使高收益债券市场涌入创纪录数量的新债券。【原文：If cut to junk status, Boeing Co. will be the biggest US corporate borrower to ever be stripped of its investment-grade ratings, flooding the high-yield bond market with a record volume of new bonds to absorb.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会称坎伯兰 DRW 是未注册的加密货币交易商
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会指控芝加哥自营交易巨头 DRW 控股有限责任公司（DRW Holdings LLC）旗下的加密货币部门作为未注册证券交易商经营超过 20 亿美元的数字资产。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission has accused the cryptocurrency arm of Chicago-based proprietary trading giant DRW Holdings LLC of operating as an unregistered securities dealer in more than $2 billion of digital assets.】

item.title: 快钱 ETF 的崛起
item.description:
在本期Trillions节目中，我们将讨论风靡一时的诱人但高风险的衍生品增强型交易所交易基金。【原文：

On this episode of Trillions, we discuss tempting but risky derivatives-enhanced exchange-traded funds that are all the rage.

】

item.title: 阿联酋 Lunate 公司斥资 10 亿美元入股信贷公司 HPS
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，总部位于阿布扎比的资产管理公司 Lunate 正在考虑购买 HPS Investment Partners 的少数股权，因为这家私人信贷公司正在权衡首次公开募股或出售事宜。【原文：Lunate, the Abu Dhabi-based asset manager, is considering buying a minority stake in HPS Investment Partners as the private credit firm weighs an initial public offering or sale, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: AMD 称新人工智能芯片即将问世 性能将超越 Nvidia
item.description: 先进微设备公司（Advanced Micro Devices Inc.【原文：Advanced Micro Devices Inc., looking to catch up with Nvidia Corp. in the lucrative market for artificial intelligence processors, said that its latest chips are rolling out to data centers and will exceed some of the capabilities of its rival.】

item.title: 俄罗斯袭击引发乌克兰谷物战争险激增
item.description: 本周，在俄罗斯加强了对关键港口的攻击后，乌克兰黑海航运走廊过境船只的保险费用骤增。【原文：The cost of insuring vessels that transit Ukraine’s shipping corridor in the Black Sea jumped this week after Russia ramped up attacks on key ports.】

item.title: 曼哈顿开发商计划将大主教办公室改建为公寓
item.description: 总部位于曼哈顿的开发商 Vanbarton Group 正计划将纽约大主教区总部大楼改造成出租房。【原文：Manhattan-based developer Vanbarton Group is planning to transform the Archdiocese of New York’s headquarters building into rental housing.】

item.title: 传奇影业正在洽谈收购万达在《沙丘》工作室的股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，传奇娱乐公司（Legendary Entertainment LLC）正在就收购大连万达集团持有的电影制片厂股份进行深入谈判，这家中国企业集团正寻求解除其最引人注目的海外收购之一。【原文：Legendary Entertainment LLC is in advanced talks to buy out Dalian Wanda Group’s stake in the movie studio, people familiar with the matter said, as the Chinese conglomerate looks to unwind one of its most high-profile overseas acquisitions.】

item.title: 高利率挤压借款人，加拿大收入差距创历史之最
item.description: 由于高利率加重了低收入家庭的债务负担，同时提高了高收入人群的投资收益，加拿大的收入不平等程度已达到本世纪最严重的程度。【原文：Income inequality in Canada has grown to the widest this century, as high interest rates add to the debt burdens of lower-earning households while boosting investment yields for higher-paid people.】

item.title: 赞比亚将把电费提高 115% 以支付进口费用
item.description: 赞比亚的能源监管机构批准了国有电力公司提高电价以支付进口电费的请求，此前 100 多年来最严重的干旱袭击了水力发电厂，导致每天长时间停电。【原文：Zambia’s energy regulator approved the state-owned power utility’s request to raise electricity prices to pay for imports after the worst drought in more than 100 years hit hydropower plants resulting in prolonged daily blackouts.】

item.title: 房贷利率创四月以来最大涨幅，30 年期房贷利率升至 6.32
item.description: 美国的抵押贷款利率连续第二周上升，达到 9 月初以来的最高水平。【原文：Mortgage rates in the US rose for a second straight week, reaching the highest level since early September.】

item.title: Altice 向债权人提供最高 15%的股份以换取减值
item.description: 法国奥迪斯公司（Altice France）提出了一项建议，让有担保债权人持有公司股份，以促使他们同意减持股份，因为这家陷入困境的电信巨头正试图削减 244 亿欧元（约合 267 亿美元）的债务。【原文：Altice France is floating a proposal to give secured creditors a stake in the company to get them to agree to a haircut on their holdings, as the embattled telecommunications giant seeks to whittle away at its €24.4 billion ($26.7 billion) of debt.】

item.title: 马里解除对马斯克的 SpaceX 公司的禁令，以控制星链的使用
item.description: 马里军方领导人解除了对销售和进口 SpaceX 公司 Starlink 卫星互联网套件的禁令。【原文：Mali’s military leadership lifted a ban on the sale and import of SpaceX’s Starlink satellite internet kits that had been imposed due to fears that the devices could be utilized by Islamist militants and separatist rebels.】

item.title: 班克曼-弗里德的政治掮客萨拉梅即将入狱
item.description: Ryan Salame 是山姆-班克曼-弗里德（Sam Bankman-Fried）在 FTX 的得力助手之一，因在欺诈性加密货币交易所工作期间犯下的罪行，他的刑期即将开始。【原文：Ryan Salame, one of Sam Bankman-Fried’s top lieutenants at FTX, is running out of road as the start of his jail term looms for crimes committed while working at the fraudulent cryptocurrency exchange.】
